author: Anne Tergesen
title: New York Tees Up a State-Sponsored Retirement-Savings Plan
text:
In a move that is expected to provide up to 3.5 million New Yorkers with access to a retirement-savings plan at work, the state legislature approved a budget bill early Friday that includes a measure to create a state-sponsored retirement savings plan.
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo supports the measure, which he will have to sign into law. “I commend the legislature for passing this policy,” the governor said in a statement, calling it a “reform that will strengthen our workforce.”
...
